name: smbcatty
description: SmbCatty is a modern SMB client for browsing and managing Windows shared folders.
author: liubaicai

scripts.dev:electron: wait-on http-get://localhost:5173 && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 node electron/launch.cjs
scripts.pack: npm run build && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--disable-warning=DEP0190 electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --publish=never
scripts.pack:dir: npm run build && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--disable-warning=DEP0190 electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --dir --publish=never
scripts.pack:win: npm run build && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--disable-warning=DEP0190 electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --win --publish=never
scripts.pack:mac: npm run build && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--disable-warning=DEP0190 electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --mac --publish=never
scripts.pack:linux: npm run build && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--disable-warning=DEP0190 electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --linux --publish=never
